channel.title: ~Walking npc i want it to stop moving!~
channel.description:
hey guys i need some help again,my old home had all my talking npcs there so i got tired of it and wanted to make a new home so i did and 1 of my npcs send owner&coder of this server demno ok so i want that on my new home so i think this is what you do you hit ::npc 409 (wich is prob not right)-(wich is genie) and than it starts to move how do i keep it stilll
regards demno :)

item.title: ~Walking npc i want it to stop moving!~
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

just do something like this

spawn = 0000 #### #### 0 0 0 0 0 1
change the 0000 to npc id, and the #### to coords, it should not move, with that,

Read full topic

item.title: ~Walking npc i want it to stop moving!~
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If your wondering what the difference is, when you have a 1,
That means that NPC has a set area to walk around in.
0= No movement, keeping in the Coordinate you set it in.

Read full topic
item.source: ~Walking npc i want it to stop moving!~

item.title: ~Walking npc i want it to stop moving!~
item.dc:creator: @I_C_Y_Pure Love
item.description:
@I_C_Y_Pure wrote:

demno:

be more specific liek where is that

Get to your config file
Ctrl + F
Autospawn
Find the npc you wish to edit
Change the LAST digit which should currently be ‘1’ now, to ‘0’

Read full topic
